headline: Ibotta, Cognex, Insperity, Viasat, and EPAM Shares Are Falling, What You Need To Know
summary: A number of stocks fell in the afternoon session after investor fears over artificial intelligence disrupting the software industry sparked a broad sell-off.

headline: A Look At EPAM Systems (EPAM) Valuation After Empathy Lab’s North American AI Agency Launch
summary: EPAM Systems (EPAM) is in focus after launching Empathy Lab in North America, an AI-native agency for brand growth, and appointing industry veteran Ben Hall to lead the effort across the U.S. and Canada. See our latest analysis for EPAM Systems. Those moves around Empathy Lab arrive after a tough spell for investors, with a 30 day share price return of a 21.75% decline and a 1 year total shareholder return of a 36.23% decline, pointing to fading momentum despite EPAM Systems trading at...

headline: Is It Time To Reassess EPAM Systems (EPAM) After Its Steep Share Price Decline
summary: If you are wondering whether EPAM Systems at around US$166 a share is a bargain or still looks expensive, you are not alone. This article walks through what the current price might be implying about the company. The stock has recently been under pressure, with a 13.2% decline over the last 7 days, a 21.7% decline over 30 days, a 17.0% decline year to date, and a 36.2% decline over the past year. The 3 year and 5 year returns stand at 48.5% and 55.2% declines respectively. These moves have...

headline: EPAM Expands AI-Native Agency Empathy Lab in North America to Help CMOs Accelerate AI-enabled Business Growth & Transformation
summary: EPAM Systems, Inc. (NYSE: EPAM), a leading digital and AI transformation company, today announced the North American launch of Empathy Lab by EPAM, its AI-native agency designed to help brands build intelligent, human-centered growth systems in an era reshaped by AI.
